subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Citi Field, the Mets’ new home for 2009, is slowly but surely taking shape. A portion of the main concourse along the first-base line, a pile of steel bars now, should be filled with concrete by opening day.
snippet: Citi Field, the Mets’ new home for 2009, is slowly but surely taking shape. A portion of the main concourse along the first-base line, a pile of steel bars now, should be filled with concrete by opening day.
